submit-and-compare.question_string:
Imagine you're growing two plants: one in sunlight and one in complete darkness. Before you see the results, what do you think will happen? Which plant will grow better, and why?

Typically, the plant in sunlight will grow better because plants need light for photosynthesis. The one in darkness may show weak or no growth.

Think about what plants need to grow. Have you heard about photosynthesis? What role does sunlight play in that process?
